    property discrepancy¶

    Quantifies the distance between the continuous uniform distribution on a hypercube and the discrete uniform distribution on distinct sample points. The lower the value, the better the coverage of the parameter space

    plot(plot_options: ~GPErks.plot.options.PlotOptions = <GPErks.plot.options.PlotOptions object>)[source]¶
